parameters.name: Between
parameters.description: True to enable the between two points symbol, or false to disable it

parameters.name: TextFrom
parameters.description: Text on the left end of the symbol

parameters.description: Text on the right end of the symbol

title: IGtol.SetBetweenTwoPoints
description: Enables or disables the between two points symbol and its texts.
signature:
void SetBetweenTwoPoints( 
   System.Boolean
Between
,
   System.String
TextFrom
,
   System.String
TextTo
)

parameters.name: Between
parameters.description: True to enable the between two points symbol, or false to disable it

parameters.name: TextFrom
parameters.description: Text on the left end of the symbol

parameters.name: TextTo
parameters.description: Text on the right end of the symbol

remarks:
The TextFrom and TextTo values might be set to empty strings.
This method ignores TextFrom and TextTo if the between value is false (the symbol is being disabled).
Use:
IGtol::GetBetweenTwoPoints
to determine if this symbol is currently in use
IGtol::GetBetweenTwoPointsText
to determine the texts that are part of this symbol
